com.crawljax.forms

Class FormHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.crawljax.forms.FormHandler

  • public class FormHandler
extends Object
    Handles form values and fills in the form input elements with random values of the defined values.
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    dannyroest@gmail.com (Danny Roest)
